dcterms:creator: Ankush Chatterjee
Kedhar Nath Narahari
Meghana Joshi
Puneet Agrawal
dcterms:description: The EmoContext task at SemEval 2019 aims to understand the emotion of the last turn expressed by a short dialog composed of three turns extracted from social media. The training set is composed of 30k records annotated with three main emotions: Happy, Sad, Angry, and the other class that includes all other unannotated emotions.
dcterms:title: EmoContext task at SemEval 2019

dcterms:creator: Saif M Mohammad
Svetlana Kiritchenko
Xiao-dan Zhu
dcterms:description: The Sentiment140 dataset contains tweets annotated for sentiment analysis, used to create word embeddings for the EmoContext task.
dcterms:title: Sentiment140 dataset

dcterms:creator: Tomas Mikolov
Ilya Sutskever
Kai Chen
Greg Corrado
Jeffrey Dean
dcterms:description: Google word embeddings are used for word representation in the EmoContext task, providing a vocabulary of 3 million words and phrases trained on approximately 100 billion words from the Google News dataset.
dcterms:title: Google word embeddings (GoEmb)

dcterms:creator: Tomas Mikolov
Ilya Sutskever
Kai Chen
Greg Corrado
Jeffrey Dean
dcterms:description: Glove word embeddings are used for word representation in the EmoContext task, providing a vocabulary of 2.2 million words trained on data crawled from generic web pages.
dcterms:title: Glove word embeddings (GLEmb)

dcterms:creator: Tomas Mikolov
Ilya Sutskever
Kai Chen
Greg Corrado
Jeffrey Dean
dcterms:description: Sentiment140 word embeddings are created from tweets annotated for sentiment analysis, providing a vocabulary of 100 dimensionality vectors for positive and negative tweets.
dcterms:title: Sentiment140 word embeddings

dcterms:creator: Tomas Mikolov
Ilya Sutskever
Kai Chen
Greg Corrado
Jeffrey Dean
dcterms:description: Generic Tweets word embeddings are created from 1.1 million generic tweets in the English language, providing a vocabulary for word representation.
dcterms:title: Generic Tweets word embeddings
